```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(naniar)
```

```{r}
pseo_co <- read_excel("~/Downloads/pseo_co.xlsx", skip = 4)
cip_info <- read_csv("~/Downloads/label_cipcode.csv")
```

```{r}
pseo <- pseo_co %>% 
  filter(agg_level_pseo == 48)

pseo <- pseo %>% 
  mutate(label_cipcode = str_replace_all(pseo$label_cipcode, pattern = "\\n", " ")) %>% 
  mutate(cipcode_twodigit = str_replace_all(pseo$cipcode, pattern = "\\..*", "")) 
```


```{r}
cip_2d <- cip_info %>% 
  slice(1:48)
pseo <- pseo %>% 
  left_join(cip_2d, by = c("cipcode_twodigit" = "CIPFamily")) 
```


```{r}
pseo %>% 
  group_by(label) %>% 
  filter(status_y1_earnings == "1", degree_level == "05", label == "Engineering") %>% 
  summarise(med =  median(as.numeric(y1_p50_earnings))) %>% 
  as.character(as.vector(pseo[1,]))
```
